cause.description:
Jonathon Harju is having problems with throwing his money around and being extravagent. He needs our help. Help us cure his KegSauce addiction and set him straight.
1. John Harju needs to calm his nerves.
2. End the Kegsauce addiction.
cause.mission: Help Cure Jonathon Harju of His Kegsauce Addiction
cause.name: KegSauce Foundation
